definition: filial/dutiful/devoted to one's parents (and grandparents etc)/to show filial piety towards (an older family member)/filial piety
to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable

sentences.english: She is extremely filial towards her parents .
The value of life lies not only in devotion but also in donation.
sentences.chinese: 熟命的價格沒有僅邪在於孝順借邪在於捐募。

sentences.english: Only the care of a parent to do all that filial piety is the real.
sentences.chinese: 只有呵護了父母心去做的一切，纔是真正的孝順。

sentences.english: Historically speaking, our ancestors placed great emphasis on filial piety.
sentences.chinese: 歷史上，我們的祖先很重視孝順。

sentences.english: If you want to have good moral character, be sure to first filial piety.
sentences.chinese: 要想有良好的道德品質，一定要先孝順父母。

sentences.english: At home, she became obedient to her mother and did a lot of housework for her.
sentences.chinese: 在家裏，她變得乖巧孝順，經常主動幫母親做家務。

sentences.english: Yuan Shu was very surprised to learn he was pious to his mother at such a young age.
sentences.chinese: 袁術見他小小年紀就懂得孝順母親，十分驚奇。

sentences.english: The one-eyed man obeyed the obedient audience's order.
sentences.chinese: 獨眼的人服從孝順的觀衆的命令。

sentences.english: the one-eyed man obeyed the obedient audience's order.
sentences.chinese: 獨眼的人服從孝順的不雅衆的號令。

sentences.english: Being filial to our uncles is in turn empathizing with our parents, which is to be filial to our parents.
sentences.chinese: 而孝順伯叔諸舅，就是善體親心，更是孝順父母了。

sentences.english: Being filial to our uncles is in turn empathizing with our parents, which is to be filial to our parents.
sentences.chinese: 而孝順伯叔諸舅，就是善體親心，更是孝順父母了。

sentences.english: I appreciate him very much because he is a filial son and a righteous friend.
sentences.chinese: 我蠻欣賞他的，因爲他很孝順，對朋友也很講重義氣。

sentences.english: She at least can best judge who is the tender filial-hearted child.
sentences.chinese: 至少她最善於辨別，誰對她最體貼，最孝順。

sentences.english: It is basic assurance to have a happy life of family.
sentences.chinese: 家庭和睦，夫妻恩愛，子女孝順是康復的基本保障。

sentences.english: In the first place, we should be filial to our parents and respectful to our teacher.
sentences.chinese: 我們應對父母要孝順，對老師要尊敬。

definition: to do what one is told/obedient
to take care of one's family
well qualified/competent/to be equal to the task/able to do sth very well
daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
